products.title: Malta Charcoal Roman Blind
products.description: Malta is one of their most popular fabric collections. Malta charcoal is a dark, statement grey shade. An elegant hue that will work well with modern grey interiors. Grey is a stylish choice, and a trend that's not looking to go anywhere just yet. This fabric is beautiful for living rooms, dining rooms or bedrooms. Their made to measure roman blinds are all handmade within the uk and will provide a touch of luxury to your interior styling.

products.title: Joyford Tweed Grey Roman Blind
products.description: An affordable textured weave fabric, their joyford range comes in a few neutral grey tones. Great for minimalist homes or to add an earthy finish to your room. Charcoal greys and slate blacks looks great with this tweed grey fabric, pair with lighter paintwork and accessories for a modern look. Product id: db-rom0975 fabric colour: tweed grey material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Malta Mid Grey Roman Blind
products.description: Malta is one of their most popular fabric collections. Malta mid grey is a stylish choice. A beautiful mid grey shade, making it perfect with lots of colour palettes within the home. This fabric is beautiful within the living room or bedroom, especially when paired with their blackout lining. Their made to measure roman blinds are all handmade within the uk and will provide a touch of luxury to your interior styling.

products.title: Faux Suede Charcoal Roman Blind
products.description: Their faux suede range of fabric has proven to be one of their most popular roman blinds and curtains for many years. Still, at the forefront of fashion, the fabric makes sumptuous roman blinds and curtains. The faux suede charcoal roman blind in a lovely grey colour is an excellent way to transform your home at an affordable price. Product id: db-rom0004 fabric colour: charcoal material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Malta Silver Grey Roman Blind
products.description: A feel for velvet at a fraction of the cost. The malta collection comes in a variety of greys and natural colourways, perfect for todays interiors. The silver-grey colour is perfect for the contemporary home or mix it up with curtains for a more traditional look. Pleasing to the eye, and great to touch the malta range adds a touch of class to your home interior. All of their roman blinds are made here in their own west yorkshire factory by their skilled workforce.

products.title: Faux Suede Deluxe New Grey Roman Blind
products.description: Chic and on trend for today's living, the new grey faux suede blind will enhance your room interior. Its trending grey tone brings a crisp classy look that is perfect for any room in your home. Pair it perfectly with several colour palettes, including blush pinks, mustard yellows, and whites. This blind is great along side co-ordinating and contrasting curtains to give your window that perfect look.

products.title: Urban Metallic Limestone Roman Blind
products.description: Urban comes in several modern grey and cream shades, this hopsack range adds modern simplicity to your kitchen or bedroom. Urban tales on a metallic appearance the light hits the fabric, adding more depth to this textured fabric. A medium grey shade, urban limestone allows the addition of a soft grey-toned fabric without being too dark or over-bearing. Perfect for retaining a light and airy theme whilst adding some colour.

products.title: Hopsack Clay Roman Blind
products.description: Simple with rustic textures the hopsack clay roman blind is one of their true best sellers. Offering a simple solution with a traditional weave for both the classical and contemporary home. Very much in style with a collection designed around a natural colour pallet, you will find that this blind will enhance your interior and give your windows a fresh and modern look. All of their hopsack roman blinds are made here in their own west yorkshire factory by their skilled workforce.
